summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2017, for the improvement of Second Avenue Northwest and Murphy Place, each from West Sixtieth Street to the north line of the Electric Motor Line Addition to the City of Seattle; North and West Seventy-second Street from Greenwood Avenue to Sixth Avenue Northwest and West Sixty-seventh Street from First Avenue Northwest to Eighth Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, and providing for all necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20422, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
